com.semartinez.projects.choppit.model.repository

Class RecipeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.semartinez.projects.choppit.model.repository.RecipeRepository

  • public class RecipeRepository
extends Object
    The repository handles requests from the MainViewModel and interacts with the JsoupMachine.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        public static void setContext(Application context)
        Parameters:
        context - ChoppitApplication.

      • getInstance

        public static RecipeRepository getInstance()
        Returns:
        a singleton instance of this class.

      • saveNew

        public Single<Recipe> saveNew(Recipe recipe)
        This save method adds a new Recipe to the database and applies its generated id to the recipeId field in all of its Steps and Ingredients.
        Parameters:
        recipe - is received from the EditingFragment
        Returns:
        the Recipe object, with auto-generated recipeId if successful.

      • update

        public Single<Integer> update(Recipe recipe)
        Parameters:
        recipe - is received from the EditingFragment.
        Returns:
        1 as a Single if the update is successful, otherwise a Single.

      • getAll

        public LiveData<List<Recipe>> getAll()
        Returns:
        all Recipes for display in the CookbookFragment.

      • loadDetails

        public Single<Recipe> loadDetails(long id)
        Parameters:
        id - database search parameter received from either the RecipeFragment or EditingFragment
        Returns:
        a Single if the update is successful, otherwise a Single

      • delete

        public Single<Integer> delete(Recipe recipe)
        Parameters:
        recipe - received by the DeleteDialog.
        Returns:
        a Single if the update is successful, otherwise a Single

      • connect

        public Completable connect(String url)
        This is the first step is processing a website. It calls Jsoup's connect method and stores the result in doc if the connection is successful.
        Parameters:
        url - is received from the user.
        Returns:
        a ReactiveX Completable.

      • generateStrings

        public Single<List<String>> generateStrings()
        This method sends the retrieved document to the JsoupMachine to extract String elements.
        Returns:
        a Single containing the Strings that match Choppit's extraction filter, or a throwable.

      • process

        public Single<AssemblyRecipe> process(String ingredient,
                                      String instruction)
        This method passes the user inputs to the JsoupMachine for processing. The resulting data is passed back up to the MainViewModel and eventually displayed in the EditingFragment.
        Parameters:
        ingredient - input by the user on the SelectionFragment
        instruction - input by the user on the SelectionFragment
        Returns:
        a list of Step objects with attached Ingredients.
